Bowing Harlequin CFL B B 1 Creature - Rogue 2/1 2 This creature enters tapped. B: Exile Bowing Harlequin from the battlefield or a graveyard plotted. Activate this ability only as a sorcery. (Cast it at sorcery speed on a future turn for no cost.)
Harlequin Bruiser CFL B 3B 4 Creature - Rogue 3/3 2 Pawn (When this enters, if you cast it from your hand, you may exile it plotted. Cast it at sorcery speed on a future turn for no cost.) When Harlequin Bruiser enters, destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
Meddling Dottore CFL B 2B 3 Creature - Noble Doctor 2/3 2 Menace (This creature can’t be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Whenever Meddling Dottore deals combat damage to a player, puppet that player until end of turn. (You control that player. You cannot look at their hand.)
Fake or True CFL B 2B 3 Sorcery 3 Target opponent separates the cards in their hand into a face-up pile and a face-down pile. You choose one pile for them to discard.
Lyrepluck Pierrot CFL G 1G 2 Creature - Bard 3/3 2 Trample Lyrepluck Pierrot doesn’t untap during your untap step. Whenever you cast a spell, untap Lyrepluck Pierrot.
Courting Innamorata CFL R 2R 3 Creature - Scion 3/2 2 Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, choose another creature you control. That creature gets +2/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
Eye Catching CFL R 3R 4 Sorcery 3 Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of combat this turn, choose a target creature you control. That creature gets +1/+0 and menace until end of turn.
Capitan's Mask CFL R R 1 Artifact - Equipment 1 Equipped creature is a Soldier in addition to its other types and gets first strike and “Whenever this creature attacks, add RRR.” Equip 2
Standing Soldiers CFL W 2W 3 Creature - Soldier 1/4 2 Vigilance Boast — Tap this creature, 1W: Soldiers you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
Soporific Pierrot CFL U 1U 2 Creature - Bard 2/1 2 When this creature enters, target opponent taps a creature they control of their choice. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap step for as long as you control Soporific Pierrot.
Balcony Suitor CFL U 2U 3 Creature - Scion Rogue 2/3 2 Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, choose another creature you control. Untap that creature, and it gains hexproof and flying until end of turn.
Dazzling Mystique CFL U UU 2 Instant 3 Return target permanent you control to its owner’s hand. Counter up to one target spell.
Pierrot Mask CFL G G 1 Artifact - Equipment 1 Equipped creature is a Bard in addition to its other types and has haste and vigilance, and must be blocked if able. When equipped creature dies, untap all lands you control. Equip 2
Zanni's Mask CFL B B 1 Artifact - Equipment 1 Equipped creature is a Rogue in addition to its other types and gets +2/+2 for each creature that has left the battlefield or spell you have cast this turn. Equip 3
Innamorata Masks CFL U U 1 Artifact - Equipment 1 Equipped creature is a Scion in addition to its other types and gets +1/+0 and has ward 2. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 2.) Equip X, where X is the number of times this ability has been activated this turn.
Vecchi's Mask CFL W W 1 Artifact - Equipment 1 Equipped creature is an Noble in addition to its other types and gets +1/+0. If it would die, you may exile it and Vecchi’s Mask plotted instead. 7: Attach this equipment to target creature. This costs 3 less for each player you control.
Rosegarden Pierrot CFL G 3G 4 Creature - Bard 1/5 2 Pawn (When this enters, if you cast it from your hand, you may exile it plotted. Cast it at sorcery speed on a future turn for no cost.) Haste, defender When this creature enters, until end of turn creatures with defender can attack, and creatures assign damage with their toughness rather than their power.
Flamboyant Sellsword CFL W W 1 Creature - Soldier Mercenary 2/1 2 Boast — 2W: Target blocking creature gets first strike until end of turn. This creature gains double strike until end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
Sparkling Vecchi CFL W 1W 2 Creature - Noble 2/2 2 Whenever this creature blocks a creature, puppet that creature’s controller for the rest of this turn. (You control that player. You cannot look at their hand.)
Mercurial Innamorata CFL UR UR 2 Creature - Scion 2/2 2 Whenever a spell or ability targets Mercurial Innamorata, you may copy it. You must select a new target for that copy. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Poignard Punchinello CFL WR 1RW 3 Creature - Soldier Rogue 3/1 2 First strike Boast — 1R/WR/W: Puppet defending player until the end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn. You control that player. You cannot look at their hand.)
Full Cast CFL WUBRG WUBRG 5 Creature - Noble Soldier Bard Rogue 3/2 2 When Full Cast enters, if you cast it from your hand, exile target permanent. T: Add one mana of any color. Plot 2 (You may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand. Cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost.)
Blundering Dottore CFL W 5W 6 Creature - Giant Noble Doctor 5/5 2 When this creature enters, each player gains 5 life. W, Exile Blundering Dottore plotted: You may skip your next turn. (Cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost.)
Inviting Troupe CFL G 5G 6 Creature - Rogue 6/6 2 Pawn (When this enters, if you cast it from your hand, you may exile it plotted. Cast it at sorcery speed on a future turn for no cost.) Trample When this creature enters, target creature has base power and toughness 6/6 until end of turn.
Smolder CFL R R 1 Instant 3 Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. Then choose one — • Smolder deals 1 damage to target creature. • Smolder deals 1 damage to each creature. • Target player sacrifices an artifact.
Braggadocious Hanger-On CFL R 3R 4 Creature - Soldier Advisor 3/3 2 Reach Boast — R: Target creature you control gains menace until end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
Reclining Rhodomonte CFL R 1R 2 Creature - Soldier Warrior 1/4 2 R: Switch this creature’s power and toughness until end of turn. Vecchi Coincounter CFL B 4B 5 Creature - Noble 3/4 2 When this creature enters, reveal your top four cards. Target opponent separates them into two piles and you choose one. Mill the unchosen pile. Then, draw the chosen cards, losing life equal to their total mana value.
